pages.title: Magma Scute
pages.text: You can obtain magmatic scute from Magmatic Turtles or from several magical ways. It's an amazing material, don't waste it.

pages.title: Improved Scute
pages.text: The magically improved version of the magmatic scute. You can obtain it from $(l)$(l:turtlemy/basic_turtlemy#improved_magma_scute)this turtlemy recipe$().
